To test the workflow:

```r
pkgdown.offline::clear_cache()
usethis::create_package("xyz")
```

Turn off internet connection, in the new project, run:

```r
usethis::use_pkgdown()
pkgdown.offline::init_site()
pkgdown.offline::build_site()
```
